snippet.title: Lost in Space - The Adventure Game - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
DEMO NOW AVAILABLE! On Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/1320430/) and Itch (https://scaryrobotgames.itch.io/lostinspace)

This is a brief teaser for the upcoming game: "Lost In Space - The Adventure Game." It's is a graphic adventure game based on the iconic 60's television series. The game will include all of the original members of the Jupiter 2 along with the return of several of the favorite Villains from the show. Play as Will, Dr. Smith and Robot as the journey through a brand new story where they venture off to rescue the other members of the Jupiter 2!

Please Wishlist the game on Steam to support us! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1320430
